trigger.name: Battery should be replaced
trigger.description: Please get a new Battery and replace it as soon as possible!

trigger.name: Load on this APC unit is to high
trigger.description: The load on this unit is too high. Buy a stronger unit or decrease the number of devices on this UPC.

trigger.name: No Power Source
trigger.description: The APC lost its power source.

trigger.name: Remaining Time on Battery is lower than 5 Minutes
UPS Capacity lower than 10 Percent
trigger.description: The Battery Capacity is lower than 10%. Check the Power source.

trigger.name: UPS Capacity lower than 20 Percent
trigger.description: The Battery Capacity is lower than 20%. Check the Power source.

trigger.name: UPS Capacity lower than 30 Percent
trigger.description: The Battery Capacity is lower than 30%. Check the Power source.

trigger.name: UPS Capacity lower than 50 Percent
trigger.description: The Battery Capacity is lower than 50%. Check the Power source.

trigger.name: UPS Capacity lower than 70 Percent
trigger.description: The Battery Capacity is lower than 70%. Check the Power source.

trigger.name: UPS Capacity lower than 90 Percent
trigger.description: The Battery Capacity is lower than 90%. Run Diagnostics.
